Man wtf. In my right sense of my mind, no way could I get off to that blind disabled guy get ntr’d. Don’t even think I could get off to it when being horny. It’s like having pre nut clarity.

Third and last part is https://nhentai.net/g/307827/ so already translated. In short girl wants to get bf a guitarr but has no money and no job. Her friend is a prostitute and introduces her to the buisness of selling herself to a fat old dude. She get's a ton of money and last page the old dude is sad this will end now that she's got the money. Then she just goes nah-ah I love this job and the easy cash so please continue to take care of me.

So yeah first part is about a wife being tricked by the boss into cheating then she regrets everything but then ends with random coworker coming up and showing a picture of her and the boss, implying he will now start blackmailing her into sex. The second part however DANG savage as fuck, story is about an old married couple the husband for some reason has become disabled, blind and barely able to use his legs. He neglects the wife and mostly sits on his bed listening to his earphones.

The wife who is alone and with no one to talk to easily falls for the person hired to care for the husband. The care dude easiliy brainwashes her into a slut and that everything would be better if her husband was "gone" then they trick him into believing it was a fire and lays it on him that she's cheating and it's all his fault. Since yeah he pretty much neglects his wife and just demand stuff from her. He has a heart attack and while he's dying they just keep fucking not caring about him. Then were shown the neighbours who say's how sad it must be for the wife losing her husband after caring for him so much. While the care worker pretty much chuckles in his mind about it and thinking that he got paid good money after what happend and how he should find a new "target". Implying he often does this going to seduce the wives of disabled husbands and then making sure they get killed so he can get a part of the life insurance or something....

Well, the first story (the depraved manager wife) is already english-translated here: https://nhentai.net/g/348293/ #### As usual, RocketMonkey's art is pretty on par with the fine art but their work is full of NTR and cheating if you can chuck that down (tbh, they are quite mild so far I've read). @eliomasullo: Still, we don't know the whole story yet and plus, NTR in real life is quite an unfortunate thing to happen to a marriage but hey who knows, maybe it's better off for the cheater and his boss! One thing comes out of it: she's a cheater and tells the kind of person she is, living a life with a lot of lies. Hope it goes well with your friend, best wishes to him.
